Title: The Might of Khaz Algar
Description:
The Harbinger thinks she can catch us off guard, but she's a fool if she expects to win this fight.

The Algari Offensive stands at your back, $n. Spare no enemy.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Faerin within the Sanguine Grasps.
RewardText: Your Horde and Alliance make a formidable army. I don't think there's much we could have done without them.
